title: ICurve.ReverseEvaluate
description: Gets the U parameter for the given XYZ location on this curve.
signature:
System.Double ReverseEvaluate( 
   System.Double
PositionX
,
   System.Double
PositionY
,
   System.Double
PositionZ
)

parameters.name: PositionX
parameters.description: X coordinate of this location on the curve

parameters.name: PositionY
parameters.description: Y coordinate of this location on the curve

parameters.name: PositionZ
parameters.description: Z coordinate of this location on the curve

returns: U parameter value for this location on the curve
